item.title: CVE-2023-2163|2024-08-09T19:05:37.091Z -- linux -- linux%20kernel
item.description: Incorrect verifier pruning in BPF in Linux Kernel >=5.4 leads to unsafe code paths being incorrectly marked as safe, resulting in arbitrary read/write in kernel memory, lateral privilege escalation, and container escape.
